page.title: 20Lavant Scool goes Swimming
page.content: Lavant Primary School swims every Monday. About 70 children, that is 3 classes go to Chichester swimming pool by coach. The journey takes 10 minutes. There are five depths: one is 3', the second is 4', the third is 5', the fourth is 6' & the last is 12'6" deep. The youngest group learn to swim in the shallow end with floats. The oldest group use the deep end. We learn front-crawl, breast stroke, back stroke and diving. We jump and dive off the diving boards, go down the slides and also swim underwater. We are awarded Certificates and Badges for swimming different lengths, e.g. 10 metres, 25m, 50m, 100m, 200m, 400m, 800m. This year two boys and a girl swam 1500 metres. We also train for survival badges.
